scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && tsc src/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers
scripts.watch_cjs: tsc src/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck -w
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6 && tsc src/app.ts -m es2015 --outDir dist/es6 --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers
scripts.build_test: rm -rf spec-js && tsc test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --sourcemap --inlineSources --outDir spec-js --target ES2015 --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --types "node,mocha,chai,sinon,sinon-chai,whatwg-fetch" --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_e2e: rm -rf .tmp/e2e && tsc ./test/e2e/main.ts  -m es2015 --outDir .tmp/e2e --sourcemap --inlineSources  --target ES5 --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.e2e.ts
scripts.build_socket: rm -rf dist/bundle/tbsdk.socket.js && tsc ./src/SocketApp.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/socket --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution  node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.socket.ts
scripts.watch_test: tsc test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --sourcemap --inlineSources --outDir spec-js --target ES2015 --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --types "node,mocha,chai,sinon,sinon-chai,whatwg-fetch" --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck --isolatedModules -w
scripts.build_mock: rm -rf dist/mock-es6 && tsc mock/index.ts -m es2015 --outDir dist/mock-es6 --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.mock.ts
scripts.build_mock_cjs: rm -rf dist/mock-cjs && tsc mock/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/mock-cjs --sourcemap --inlineSources --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_all: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/bundle && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_bundle && npm run build_mock && npm run build_mock_cjs && npm run build_test && npm run build_e2e && npm run build_socket
scripts.cover: npm run build_test &&  nyc --reporter=html --exclude=node_modules --exclude=spec-js/test --exclude=spec-js/mock --exclude=spec-js/src/sockets/SocketClient.js tman --mocha spec-js/test/unit/app.js
scripts.publish_all: npm run build_all && npm publish && ts-node ./tools/tasks/publish.ts && cp -r ./dist/mock-cjs/** ./.tmp/mock && cp -r ./dist/socket/** ./.tmp/socket && npm publish .tmp/mock/ && npm publish .tmp/socket/
